PyEmir User Guide¶

This guide is intended as an introductory overview of PyEmir and explains how to install and make use of the most important features of Pyemir. For detailed reference documentation of the functions and classes contained in the package, see the PyEmir Reference.

Warning

This “User Guide” is still a work in progress; some of the material is not organized, and several aspects of PyEmir are not yet covered sufficient detail.

  • PyEmir Installation
    • Stable version
    • Development version
    • Building the documentation
  • PyEmir Deployment with Virtualenv
    • Install virtualenv
    • Create virtual environment
    • Activate the environment
    • Install PyEMIR
  • PyEmir Deployment with Conda
    • Install conda
    • Create an environment
    • Install dependencies
    • Download and install the source code
  • Running the pipeline
    • Format of the observation result
    • Format of the requirements file
    • Running the pipeline
  • EMIR Reduction Recipes
    • Execution environment of the Recipes
    • Recipe Parameters
    • Recipe Products
  • EMIR Data Products
    • FITS Keywords
    • Raw Image data products
    • Image data products
  • High Level description of the EMIR Data Reduction Pipeline
    • Introduction
    • Basic observing modes and strategies
    • Imaging Mode
    • Multi-Object Spectroscopy Mode
  • Engineering Recipes
    • Cosmetics
  • Auxiliary Recipes
    • Bias Image
    • Dark Current Image
    • Intensity Flat-Field
  • Imaging Recipes
    • Stare Image
    • Nodded/Beam-switched images
    • Dithered images
    • Micro-dithered images
